General.Name: Shun On Electronic Co Ltd
General.Description: Shun On Electronic Co., Ltd. primarily manufactures and sells computer components in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers membranes for computer, communication, and consumer electronics products, as well as for peripheral products, such keyboards, mouse, graphics tablets, phone, dome switches, and industrial equipment; and panels with dome switches for electronic products, household electric appliances, communication products, medical equipment, test equipment, automatic machines, audio products, and peripheral products of computers. It also provides automotive electronics, including cameras, 3D around view monitor systems, auto-driving products, and collision warning systems. In addition, the company offers automotive engineering products, such as metallic materials comprising hydroformings, magnesium alloy die-castings, aluminum alloy forgings, high-tensile steel stampings, hot stampings, aluminum plate stampings, and dies and transfer dies; and composite materials, which include double and high-gloss injection products, plastic materials, and carbon fiber reinforced polymer products, as well as artificial intelligent manufacturing products comprising intelligent production line solutions, in-mold temperature and pressure sensing technique, assembly lines, checking and jig fixtures, automation machines, and environmental engineering products. Shun On Electronic Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
